Description.Name: Homing Arrow IV Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Homing Arrow IV missiles can lock on to a single target designated by a friendly TAG. These missiles use in-flight targeting to fire and lock on in a single turn. If no target is acquired, the missile can be used for unguided artillery fire.

Homing Arrow IV Ammo Bins each contain 5 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
